select a.transTime,a.channel, round(sum(case when a.channel = '支付宝' then a.sum_trans end),2) as alipaySumTrans, round(sum(case when a.channel = '支付宝' then a.count_trans end),0) as alipayCountTrans, round(sum(case when a.channel = '微信' then a.sum_trans end),2) as wechatSumTrans, round(sum(case when a.channel = '微信' then a.count_trans end),0) as wechatCountTrans from( select date_format(t.transTime, '%Y-%m-%d') transTime, (case when t.channel = 1 then '支付宝' when t.channel = 2 then '微信' end) channel, sum(t.transPrice) sum_trans,count(date_format(t.transTime, '%Y-%m-%d')) count_trans from t_pay_tran_ls t where 1=1
